ResourceHeader.Description: Catalogs based on Wind, IMP 8 and ACE of each of several types of solar wind features: magnetic clouds, high speed streams, low speed intervals, shocks, sector boundary crossings, Bz<0 and Bz>0 intervals, etc.

InformationURL.Description: The website contains detailed Information about the ISTP Solar Wind Catalog.

Rights.Note: CC0 1.0 Universal is the Creative Commons license applicable to all publicly available NASA Heliophysics data products

AccessURL.Name: ISTP Solar Wind Catalog
AccessURL.Description: ISTP Solar Wind Catalog Candidate Events includes Candidate Events for Further Study Candidate events are listed in chronological order; the category columns lists the event types as defined above. The s/c column identifies the spacecraft (W=WIND, 8=IMP-8) that observed the particular feature, while the Comments column includes particular

Parameter.Name: Category
Parameter.Description: This column lists the event types Specific catalog categories: interplanetary magnetic clouds miscellaneous features in the SW interactive regions in the SW intervals of IMF Bz northward interplanetary shocks intervals of IMF Bz southward low speed stream intervals in the SW changes in the direction of the Ey component of the electric field magnetic field sector boundary crossings SW high speed streams (mostly related to solar magnetic coronal holes.

Parameter.Name: S/C
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft (W=WIND, 8=IMP-8) that observed the particular feature
